mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party_comment (post_id, user_num, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userNum}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, post_id AS postId, user_num AS userNum, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM party_comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}

SELECT p.comment_id AS commentId, p.post_id AS postId, p.user_num AS userNum, p.content, created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_profile AS userProfile FROM party_comment p JOIN user u ON p.user_num = u.user_num WHERE post_id = #{postId}
